1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Encode using mix text.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.MixText.MixEncode
6  ( MixEncode (..),
7    TransString,
8    encode,
9    plainEncode,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.MixText.MixText    as B
14
15-- | Encode via mix text.
16class MixEncode a where
17    mixEncode :: a -> B.MixText
18    mixEncode = mixTransEncode O.nothing
19
20    mixTransEncode :: TransString -> a -> B.MixText
21    mixTransEncode _ = mixEncode
22
23-- | @(+)@ or @(-)@.
24instance MixEncode Bool where
25    mixEncode True  = B.mixString "(+)"
26    mixEncode False = B.mixString "(-)"
27
28-- | Transform string to another form.
29type TransString = String -> Maybe String
30
31-- | Encode to string.
32encode :: (MixEncode a) => a -> String
33encode = (B.mixToFlatString . mixEncode)
34
35-- | Encode to string.
36{-# DEPRECATED plainEncode "Use 'encode' instead." #-}
37plainEncode :: (MixEncode a) => a -> String
38plainEncode = encode
39
